fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article referred to newly released figures on different types of weddings as being from the Office for National Statistics. The ONS records religious and civil ceremonies, not humanist weddings. That data was compiled by Humanists UK (Sharp rise in humanist weddings fuels calls for legal recognition, 3 June, page 20). • Other recently corrected articles include: The Guardian view on identities in conflict: dealing with differences ‘It’s long overdue’: the first exhibition for Native American female artists ‘Mini-Trump across the Channel’: EU media on Boris Johnson as British PM
